home.title: Welcome to My Malaysia Second Home Program123
home.subtitle: Your Gateway to a New Life in Malaysia
home.description: With the My Malaysia Second Home program, we are dedicated to making your transition to living in Malaysia seamless, exciting, and hassle-free. Whether you're seeking a retirement haven, a thriving business environment, or a vibrant lifestyle, Malaysia offers numerous opportunities for expatriates to thrive.

what_is.title: 什么是马来西亚我的第二家园计划？
what_is.description: 马来西亚我的第二家园（MM2H）计划是马来西亚政府推出的一项长期签证计划，允许符合条件的个人在马来西亚停留最长20年。该计划为外国人提供了一个享受马来西亚丰富文化、实惠生活和世界级设施的机会。

benefits.1: 灵活的签证选项满足所有需求
benefits.2: 具有吸引力的财务优惠
benefits.6: 战略性商业和工作机会
